result.reason: Issue requests running mRemoteNG from a WebDAV-mapped drive but provides no error details, OS version, or WebDAV provider (IIS, SharePoint, etc.) to diagnose path resolution or startup failures.
result.approach: Reproduce with a WebDAV mapped drive; check if Application.StartupPath resolves correctly on WebDAV paths and whether config/temp file writes fail due to UNC or permission restrictions; add fallback to %APPDATA% if startup path is unreachable.
